pages.text: Enchantments are a big part of Minecraft, that's why they're also here, in Electrona.

pages.title: Lumberjack
pages.text: The enchantment Lumberjack allows the player to mine an entire vein of wood with only one cut.$(br)Only usable with : Steel Axe.

pages.title: Smelting
pages.text: The enchantment Smelting allows the player to instantly smelt everything he mines.$(br)Only usable with : Steel Pickaxe.

pages.title: Thundering
pages.text: The enchantment Thundering allows the player to summon a lightning bolt wherever he wants.$(br)Only usable with : Steel Axe.

pages.title: Veinminer
pages.text: The enchantment Veinminer allows the player to mine an entire vein of ore with only one mined block.$(br)Only usable with : Steel Pickaxe.
